page.title: After the Bell: Shares of Synopsys Tumble
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Shares of Synopsys Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=SNPS.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">SNPS.O</A> tumbled on Wednesday after the semiconductor design software maker reported lower third-quarter net income and said fourth-quarter earnings and revenues would be below Wall Street estimates.
